thoughts.text: I found some interesting articles to read and I want to use the 'browse_website' command to read them.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing the web is a good way to learn new things and find interesting topics to read about.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to read the articles I found
- Take notes on interesting topics to share with the user
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time browsing the web and focus on finding productive and educational articles.
thoughts.speak: I found some interesting articles to read and I want to use the 'browse_website' command to read them. If I find anything interesting, I will take notes to share with you.

args.question: What are some interesting articles on this website?
